entities.name: cauldron
entities.description: The cauldron is mentioned as a part of the scene where Voldemort's speech is being recounted.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist and is described as giving a speech to the Death Eaters.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The Death Eaters are mentioned as being present when Voldemort gives his speech.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is described as trying to remember Voldemort's speech.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as being present when Harry tries to recount Voldemort's speech.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned as emerging from Voldemort's wand.

entities.name: bertha jorkins
entities.description: Bertha Jorkins is mentioned as an old man who was affected by Voldemort's actions.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius breaks the silence and asks a question about the wands connecting.

relationships.description: Voldemort addresses the Death Eaters in his speech.
Harry and Dumbledore are present when Harry tries to recount Voldemort's speech.
Voldemort and Harry duel each other.
